Nightlight::

"Perhaps, we can find a way that you can fuction without hurt other 
transformers... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> He listened to it all.
> 
> "Well I would be lieing if I said that I understood how you can 
function without a spark, and the feeding is an unusual curse. But if 
you are true to the Maximal ways, you may stay with us and we will 
try to help you. Nightlight is right, it would help to know the 
process of your creation, but if even you dont know then that is out. 
Perhaps we will find a way to "cure" you of the feeding though."
